Splendours of Egypt, A Women-Only Tour | Insight Vacations | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Splendours of Egypt, a Women-Only Tour 12 days | Cairo roundtrip Embark on this captivating 12-day women-only tour with Insight Vacations , exploring the treasures of Egypt. Cruise the Nile, learn the art of belly dancing, and indulge in a sundowner at the iconic Old Cataract Hotel, once frequented by luminaries like Winston Churchill and Agatha Christie. Explore Luxor, home to the Valley of the Queens and the Valley of the Kings, where legendary pharaohs, including Tutankhamun, rest. In Cairo, marvel at the Step Pyramid of King Zoser, the oldest pyramid, and visit the iconic Pyramids of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Delve deeper into Egyptian culture by meeting local women and discovering the history of papyrus, all while enjoying a mesmerizing sound and light show at the Sphinx. Deal Details Travel Dates 7 May, 4 Jun, 9 Jul, 13 Aug, 10 Sep 2025 Priced From $7,797 per person Enquire Now Embark on this captivating 12-day women-only tour with Insight Vacations , exploring the treasures of Egypt. Cruise the Nile, learn the art of belly dancing, and indulge in a sundowner at the iconic Old Cataract Hotel, once frequented by luminaries like Winston Churchill and Agatha Christie. Explore Luxor, home to the Valley of the Queens and the Valley of the Kings, where legendary pharaohs, including Tutankhamun, rest. In Cairo, marvel at the Step Pyramid of King Zoser, the oldest pyramid, and visit the iconic Pyramids of Giza, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. Delve deeper into Egyptian culture by meeting local women and discovering the history of papyrus, all while enjoying a mesmerizing sound and light show at the Sphinx. Pricing 7 May, 4 Jun 2025 from $7,797* per person, twin share 9 Jul, 13 Aug & 10 Sep 2025 from $7,843* per person, twin share Itinerary Day 1 Arrive in Cairo Day 2 Fly to Luxor, Cruise the Nile Day 3 Exploring Dendera and on to Edfu Day 4 Edfu to Aswan Day 5 Aswan's High Dam & Temple of Isis Day 6 Feluccas and Sundowner Day 7 Free Time on to Kom Ombo Day 8 Cruising the Nile to Luxor Day 9 Explore Luxor and fly to Cairo Day 10 Cairo Sightseeing Day 11 Cairo and the Pyramids of Giza Day 12 Depart Cairo Inclusions 11 nights' accommodation at select hotels. Meals, including 11 breakfasts, 7 lunches, 1 Afternoon Tea & 7 dinners with wine. Personal radio headsets give you the freedom to wander during visits to famous highlights, without missing any of your Local Expert's fascinating commentary. Hotel and restaurant tips are included - you'll never have to worry about how much to give, nor search for foreign currency. We also include all taxes and porterage charges at hotels. We carry your bags for you and promptly deliver them to your hotel door. From time to time, your Travel Director will delight you with an Insight Flourish, which is a local specialty representing the destination. Stay connected with friends and family with our complimentary coach and hotel Wi-Fi (where available). If your arrival and/or departure flights are as per the itinerary start and end dates, then transfers are available at scheduled times. If your flights are outside these times, or you have booked additional nights accommodation with Insight Vacations, you may purchase transfers or make your own way from/to the airport. Highlights Meet the women of a local women-owned co-operative in Aswan, supporting over 300 vulnerable women to become financially independent. Learn the ancient art of papyrus making and receive a small gift commemorating your visit. Discover the ancient art of belly dancing, an identifying element of Egyptian culture since the 4th Century. Join an Egyptian cooking class and learn to make traditional dishes like vegetable Moussaka. Explore the Valley of the Queens, a burial ground for royal wives, daughters, and sons from 1550 to 1080 B.C. Terms & Conditions Prices are in NZD (unless specified otherwise) per person, in complete twin/double share accommodation (or single occupancy where specified), valid for new bookings only, subject to availability. Offers are capacity-controlled and may be reduced, changed, extended or withdrawn at any time, without notice. Unless specified, airfares (and often transfers) are additional. Pricing variations may occur due to fluctuations in currency exchange rates. Prices include savings/discounts where applicable and all taxes/charges (which are subject to change). Offers valid for travel originating in New Zealand only. Required deposit amounts and deposit/final payment dates vary by product booked. Deposits may or may not be refundable. Amendment and cancellation fees apply, which vary based on supplier. All products and itineraries are subject to change at the discretion of the supplier. Prices are based on cash, Eftpos, or Direct Credit payment only. We accept all major credit cards, however, processing fees apply. To be read in conjunction with the booking terms and conditions applicable for Insight Vacations. Please always refer to your World Travellers Consultant for full details. Travel documents & vaccination requirements are the responsibility of the individual traveller. Professional service fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
